code: import{composeWithDevTools}from'redux-devtools-extension';import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import thunk from'redux-thunk';import reducers from'../reducers';var initState={loadingItems:0};export default function configureStore(){var store=createStore(reducers,initState,composeWithDevTools(applyMiddleware(thunk)));return store;}
